title: (x) Italic serif face similar to Dolly - TEFF Collis {Ties, Jan E}
content:
I thought at first glance that it was the dolly italic, but closer inspection showed it wasn't. =)

thanks people!!  
dav2.

comments.content:
[Collis italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020061902/http:/www.teff.nl/fonts/collis/collis.html)

Could well be.

[EDIT] I edit my post as well, so everything is in the correct order.

Now this is going to be really confusing! :^D

Good sport, Jan. ;^)

sorry for the late reply guys, been away for new designers and new blood for a few weeks.

Thank you for your help! it's very much appreciated!!

regards,  
dav2.
